context: In 2020, PTC competed with CAD (Creo) against established players and expanded IoT (ThingWorx) and AR (Vuforia) offerings. The pandemic accelerated digital transformation and remote collaboration needs. PTC's Onshape (acquired 2019) cloud CAD positioned against traditional desktop tools. The SaaS transition and subscription model adoption were industry-wide trends. Competition focused on integrating design, simulation, IoT, and AR capabilities across product lifecycle.
